meta.title: SBP - Leading Nickel Mining Company
meta.description: SBP is a leading nickel mining company committed to sustainable practices and community development.

hero.slogan: Leading the way in nickel mining and sustainable practices

about.title: About SBP
about.description: SBP mines nickel ore with a nickel content of 1.6-1.8% in Konawe Utara, Sulawesi Tenggara, Indonesia.

production.title: Production
production.description: In 2024, our target production is 800,000 tons. The quality of nickel mined is 1.6-1.8%, with 1.4 as off-spec.
